name: Crop Farmer (OUT NOW)
description: Welcome to crop Farmer an open world pixel farmer game! Build your shop up and sell crops to everyone to earn gold than go on your laptop and by crop seeds to expand your farm you can also customize and buy bigger plots so that you can do more . But there's a twist this is no ordinary farming game... Fight bosses discover lands play with your friends to fight and explore the big open world of your farm! Travel to the city meet new people and be the best Farmer out there!
